verses.1: Tua ciangin a tapa Jehoshafat in ama tangin uk a, Israel langpangin a mahmah kithakhauhsak hi.
verses.2: Amah in Judah khuapi kulhneite khempeuh ah galkapte koih a, Judah gam sung le a pa Asa in a lak sa Efraim khuapite sungah khuacingte a koih hi.
verses.3: Amah in a paʼ gamtat masate zui ahih manin Jehoshafat tawh Topa om hi. Amah in Baal-te bia lo hi.
verses.4: Israel-teʼ gamtat bang hi loin ama paʼ Pasian zongin ama thupiakna a zui hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ama khut sungah kumpi gam kipsak a, Judah mi khempeuh in Jehoshafat tungah siah puak uh hi. Amah hau mahmah a, minthang mahmah hi.
verses.6: Topaʼ na a sepna ah hang mahmah a, Judah gam sung panin mual dawna biakpiaknate le Asherah milimte a la khia hi.
verses.7: Ama uk a kum thumna kumin ama uliante Benhail, Obadiah, Zekhariah, Nethanel le Mikaiah, Judah khuapite ah thuhilh dingin a sawl hi.
verses.8: Amaute tawh Levi mi Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah le Tob-adonijah a paikhawmsak hi. Tua ciangin Levi mite tawh siampi Elishama le Jehoram zong a paisak hi.
verses.9: Amaute in Topaʼ thukham laibu kengin Judah gam sungah hilh uh hi. Judah khuapi khempeuh ah amaute pai kawikawi-in mite lakah a hilh uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin Judah gam kimkot ah a om kumpi gam khempeuh tungah Topa kihtakna om a, amaute in Jehoshafat do ngam nawn lo uh hi.
verses.11: Filistia mite pawl khat in Jehoshafat tungah letsongte le siah dingin ngun a puak uh hi. Tua ciangin Arab-te in zong ama tungah tuutal tul sagih le za sagih le keeltal tul sagih le za sagih mah a puak uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin Jehoshafat hong lian zaw semsem hi. Amah in Judah gam sungah mun muanhuaite le vankoihna khuapite lam a,
verses.13: amah in Judah khuapite sungah van tampi a nei hi. Amah in a thahat a hang galkapte Jerusalem ah a nei hi.
verses.14: A beh ciat uh tawh kizui-in amaute a phazah hih bang ahi hi. Judah sung pan a tulin a ukte: Adnah a ukpa hi a, a thahat a galhang mi tul za thum tawh ahi hi.
verses.15: Ama zomah a ukpa Jehohanan hi a, mi tul za nih le tul sawm giat tawh ahi hi.
verses.16: Ama zomah Topaʼ nasep nadingin a kipia Zikriʼ tapa Amasiah hi a, a thahat a galhang mi tul za nih tawh ahi hi.
verses.17: Benjamin sung panin: A thahat a galhang Eliada hi a, thal le lum a tawi mi tul za nih tawh ahi hi.
verses.18: Tua ciangin ama zomah Jehozabad hi a, galdo dingin hiam a tawi mi tul za khat le tul sawm giat tawh ahi hi.
verses.19: Hihte pen kumpipa in Judah gam sung khempeuh ah kulh a nei khuapite ah a koihte banah kumpipaʼ na a semte ahi hi.
